content: Can I put this one under attention? It largely follows the API for Lindelöf spaces, but it would be nice to have this in Mathlib. It should be easy to review as it doesn’t add a lot, it mainly generalizes. Afterwards, I can add the remaining 2/3rd in Mathlib and subsequently refactor Lindelöf spaces if we want!
Sorry, I did a drive by review but didn't intend that to inhibit someone else finishing it.
No worries, I'm not in a rush to get this in Mathlib, but I'm hesitant to refactor all the other things before I get the green light/ a merge on this one!
Same for #11774 by the way, that one is similarly straightforward in my opinion!
Sorry, it was on my radar at some point then I forgot about it. I’ll have a look soon :tm:
